storyInfo:
The competition gradually intensifies. Lin YÃ¼hsia finds the trail of something dodgy, but she doesn't investigate much deeper.
Elsewhere, Ch'en gets into a back alley brawl to aid a contestant named Mizuki.

attributes.content: We're already thirty minutes into the contest, and what's shocking is, not a single team who's picked up some gold has chosen to end it yet.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: I can't help but see wild, wild ambition in these championship contestants!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Mr. Pancho, what's your perspective?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Looks to be a fierce championship, this one. One for the ages. Got great expectations for it.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: No arguments here, I'm sure all of you in the audience feel just the same.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Each of our stages will keep following each team's action, so we guarantee you won't miss a single bedazzling fight.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: And you'd better not relax just yet. We're gonna turn this pressure, this urgency into a force for voting, and give the contestants you love your precious ballot!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Once you spend for them, that's when you truly love them!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: My dear, save me!
attributes.name: Sluggish Female Tourist

attributes.content: Don't be afraid, my darling, I'll come rescue you!
attributes.name: Impatient Male Tourist

attributes.content: Tsk! I thought the whole lover act was a joke! How do they have so much fight?!
attributes.name: Irritated Contestant

attributes.content: Darling, how fortuitous, I almost thought I'd lose you. (Whisper) Can't you come up with a plan of your own?!
attributes.name: Impatient Male Tourist

attributes.content: Ohh, how fearsome they were. (Whisper) My CHARACTER'S a frail girl, huevÃ³n!
attributes.name: Sluggish Female Tourist

attributes.content: It's alright, it's all okay now. Watch me teach them a lesson! (Whisper) Tch! Start trying, okay, Miss?
attributes.name: Impatient Male Tourist

attributes.content: Oh, my dear, you're the best~ (Whisper) Are you messing with me?!
attributes.name: Sluggish Female Tourist

attributes.content: (Those two have no uncertainty of skill. And military temperaments on top of it. Perhaps they served in the past.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (As for being sweethearts, I presume that's a ploy of sorts, for winning the audience over.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (Very aggrandizing, but still a means nonetheless.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (Though, still, very aggrandizing.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (If that Swire saw this, I'm sure she'd waste no time gushing how she'd like to play a similar role in such a contest.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (We're better off not letting her find out.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (All in all, this couple has a secure win. Nothing to see there, no gold after a sweep of the area. Time to leave.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (Twenty ingots of pure gold. I worry more than a few are in conspicuous placesâon top of all the landmarks and such. Those areas will be hotly contested.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (Nothing really calls for fighting over those ingots.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (I should be searching for the ones left behind in hidden corners.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (But... if there are ruffians out to cause chaos under this contest, I'm sure they'd at least find blind spots in the cameras and drones before they do their work.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (Both need addressing... I ought to bring it up with Hui-chieh first. Tsk, too quick.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (Forget it. I have no desire to discuss anything with that juvenile woman anyway. I'll handle things as they come.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, can I ask something?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You and Miss Lin are old friends, right?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What makes you think so?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You certainly don't feel like enemies, there's not that much intensity. But suppose something went down between you twoâyou still seem pretty well aware of each other.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You could say that...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We went to the same primary school, and we had a common acquaintance.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So your guess is fairly close.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I won't be telling you why she and I don't get along.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's alright. I can't imagine it's anything minor if it happened between people like you, and I don't plan on asking details. I was just throwing up a topic.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You know, though, it's like you never imagined she'd show up here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Slice it any way you want, it's like it was fated. Have you ever thought about making up with her before?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Do you care that much about this?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I don't really... or maybe I do. This city is all just money, money, money 'til the sun goes down. Things like friendship are a huge luxury.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: This isn't something we can just fix... even if either of us wanted to.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wait a second. Miss Ch'en, look at that alley there.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Hm... this is kind of a bind.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: With all these cameras, going too heavy-handed isn't gonna be a good look.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Rgh, I don't know what it is, but I can't land a good hit on this runt. Something's not right!
attributes.name: Irritated Contestant

attributes.content: He just thinks he can piss around with us. Let's take him together!
attributes.name: Angered Contestant

attributes.content: Look at that. It's the solo contestant, stuck in an ambush.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What's your call, Miss Ch'en? Wait until they finish fighting?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You're going to help him?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: There's no real benefit to it. The championship isn't about helping your fellow contestantsâthe disciplined approach doesn't fly here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I know. Just stay here and wait for me a moment.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And as promptly as that, Ch'en has already dashed out.
Ernesto is silent for a moment, and doesn't follow.
(They've even installed cameras in crevices like this. These can't have been just for the competition.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (But even so, the residential housing ought not to have surveillance in it. I'm guessing drones will only film interiors if they capture contestants going in.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (In other words, as long as you're not physically filmed entering, there's a high chance officials won't notice you.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (If you exploit that fact... hm?)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (...Heh. Speak and it shall come.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: What's the status?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Bombs are all set on our end, Rafaela.
attributes.name: Contestant?

attributes.content: Good. I'm done here too.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Let's move to the next location.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Hold on, I just got a distress from C-team. Seems like they're really struggling with an opponent there.
attributes.name: Contestant?

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: It's Ch'en from the LUNG wRATh team.
attributes.name: Contestant?

attributes.content: Hermano told us not to take on what we can't handle.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Move a nearby team to them, don't stand out too much. Give it up if it's a losing battle, don't keep fighting out of obligation. Our actual job takes priority.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Contestant?

attributes.text: After Rafaela parts with the stranger, Lin YÃ¼hsia noiselessly drops down from a beam in the roof, and lands where they stood just a moment ago.
With her proficiency, it takes little effort to find the bomb Rafaela mentioned.

attributes.content: (...She was being serious.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (I never imagined the girl would be one of them.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (I imagine, by 'actual job,' they mean more of these bombs, and it sounds as if there are several teams on it.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (The officials might have prohibited comms equipment, but all signs indicate they have their own way of keeping in touch, under the radar.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (And there's no knowing if they have a plan B. I'm worried there won't be much meaning in keeping on their trail, and there's the risk of being found.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (Two things stood out: 'Bombs', 'Hermano'. They can play into our knowledge. Having these few keywords should be sufficient for now.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (...It's about time to rendezvous, too. Perfect chance to see how Hui-chieh's done.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Though not cleared out for the competition, it's an ordinarily lonely alleyway, but right this moment it's host to sheer hubbub.
From roofs, windowsills, balconies, fencetops, ill-meaning contestants are all icily fixed on the figure stood in the dead centerâCh'en.
She is completely unshaken. She simply grips her water gun tight.
At the entrance, together with Ernesto stands Mizuki, who has just been saved by Ch'en. Mizuki's face tells of happy surprise, but Ernesto wears hesitance.
However, in this moment, they are beyond anyone's attention.
Silent throughout the alley, it's as if the air is just as frozen.
Only one sole scrap of proof that the wet air blows through the tips of their hair, that this charged scene isn't just a still image.
'Drip-drop.'
Somewhere unknown, a loosely shut faucet drips water, the droplets striking the basin, the noise minute. The noise, nevertheless, is like a stone breaking a placid lake's surface.
In a split-second, the contestants around her all swarm in, and Ch'en takes her opening steps.
Atop a roof, Lin YÃ¼hsia calmly confirms the situation surrounding.
(There she is, playing at the hero again.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (She'll spend eternity without learning to behave. I'm not bothered to help her.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (That said, the commotion's audible enough for some teams in the vicinity to make for here.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: (...I suppose I'll hold them off. Drawing too many people's attention won't do any good.)
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Lin YÃ¼hsia loosens her wrists, hops down from the roof, and lands squarely at the alley entrance.
Not far away, figures are already coming into sight. She takes in a tiny breath, and assumes her stance.
